description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Wellington, New Zealand. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Boutique Wellington Urban Hideaway near Sky Stadium
hotels.description: Commanding a prime position on the city fringe, Atura Wellington makes the perfect base to explore the lively capital of New Zealand. From the visually aesthetic lobby, cutting-edge comforts and calming hues, this sanctuary is a contemporary hideaway and the perfect nod to Wellington's creative culture. When you return from your adventures, head to Frankie's Eatery for home-style food with brasserie-style flair followed by a cocktail or ice-cold pint at Frankie's Bar.

hotels.title: Central Wellington Oasis near Botanic Garden with Restaurant and Bar
hotels.description: Indulge in unparalleled luxury at Sofitel Wellington, perfectly positioned in the heart of New Zealand's vibrant capital. Savor exquisite dining at the renowned Jardin Grill or unwind with a cocktail at the stylish La Serre Bar. Stay active with a visit to the fitness centre or relax in your room, featuring stunning city or garden views. This retreat is a stone's throw from the city's premier shopping district, Lambton Quay and the beautiful Wellington Botanic Garden. Take a scenic ride on the Wellington Cable Car for panoramic views of the city and harbour, or a short drive away you'll find the Te Papa Museum, where you can delve into the country's rich history and culture.

hotels.title: Central Wellington Novotel Stay Near Lambton Quay & Te Papa Museum
hotels.description: Be mesmerised with the cosmopolitan charm of New Zealand's capital with a stay at this stylish Novotel property. The centrally located hotel offers direct lift access to the vibrant waterfront precinct of Lambton Quay, putting you just moments away from the Te Papa Museum, historic Wellington Cable Car and Botanical Gardens. Wander along the waterfront to explore the city's renowned culinary scene, hopping from craft beer brewery to restaurant and back again. Back at the hotel, savour local flavours and sip on fresh cocktails at Caucus Restaurant and Bar, or maintain your fitness routine at the compact gym. Retire to your chic rooms with views of the harbour or city, and call it a day with top-end amenities and unrivalled hospitality.

hotels.title: Eclectic QT Escape near Wellington Harbour with Parisian-Inspired Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Unleash your inner art critic and get lost in the unique, ultra-cool vibes of QT Wellington, located in the middle of the city, just steps from the shimmering harbour. Explore fiery flavours in New Zealand's capital city at Hot Sauce restaurant, whipping up traditional Asian delights and trailblazing cocktails, embrace French sophistication and eclectic décor at Hippopotamus restaurant and get amid the buzz of the Lobby Lounge with the perfect cup of coffee. Venture outside your hotel to discover Wellington's popular attractions, including Museum of New Zealand Te Papa Tongarewa, Wellington Museum and the Underground Market.

hotels.title: Stylish City Escape in the Heart of Wellington's Entertainment Precinct
hotels.description: Discover Wellington's sophisticated coffee culture, hopping craft beer scene and electric nightlife with a stay at the stylish Oaks Wellington Hotel, nestled in the heart of the city's vibrant entertainment precinct. Wellington's gourmet scene is legendary - and the hotel is the perfect launchpad for travellers looking to experience the city’s countless gastronomic delights. Recently reimagined, Oaks Wellington Hotel pays loving homage to the building’s heritage as a Ford vehicle assembly plant while celebrating its dazzling future. Enjoy every bite at onsite restaurant Oak & Vine, serving modern Kiwi cuisine with a Mediterranean twist, head out for a night on the town or simply sit back and savour the magnificent city views - this is Wellington, your way.

hotels.title: Stylish Wellington Apartment-Style Escape in Thorndon Quay near Sky Stadium
hotels.description: Discover the beauty of New Zealand's capital city with a stay at this stylish apartment-style hotel. This chic retreat is ideally located in the heart of Wellington's Thorndon district, a stone's throw from the historic Old St. Paul's Cathedral and the scenic Wellington Botanic Garden. In between exploring, retreat to your elegant room or apartment and feel right at home, then seek retail therapy at Lambton Quay Shopping District or head to the Sky Stadium right next door to catch a concert or rugby match. Explore, rest and repeat!

hotels.title: Five-Star InterContinental Wellington Stay Overlooking the Harbour
hotels.description: Experience harbourfront luxury at InterContinental Wellington, an IHG Hotel, and get to know New Zealand's quirky capital, where street art-sprayed laneways meet a jaw-dropping mountain backdrop. Your hotel places you in the midst of the action, with the waterfront, Jervois Quay, and the Wellington Cable Car on your doorstep, not to mention the city's renowned arts and dining scene. After busy days exploring, your elegant hotel welcomes you back with its indoor pool, sauna, fitness centre and casual dining venues.

hotels.title: Convenient Wellington Airport Stay with Coastal Views
hotels.description: Refresh and recharge at Rydges Wellington Airport, a stylish retreat conveniently located within the New Zealand capital city's airport. When you're not checking out the Te Papa and Wellington museums, magical Mt Victoria and lively Cuba Street, enjoy moments of downtime at your hotel, with airport runway and sunset south coast vistas. Home to contemporary rooms, the delicious Whiskey Lima Golf restaurant and the trendy Peloton Bar + Eatery, this hotel offers everything you need for a comfortable stay or layover.

seo.title: Hôtels à Wellington - New Zealand Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trouvez les meilleurs hôtels à Wellington, New Zealand avec des offres exclusives. Réservez votre escapade parfaite avec jusqu'à 60% de réduction.
